description: An Angular 2 Wrapper for the Firebase JavaScript SDK
name: firebase-angular2

scripts.build:docs: typedoc --out ./docs --name "Angular 2 Firebase" --readme ./README.md --target ES5 --mode file --externalPattern "./node_modules/**/*" --excludeExternals --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --emitDecoratorMetadata --experimentalDecorators "./src"
scripts.test:w: concurrent "npm run karma -- start --browsers Chrome" "npm run build:test:w"
